short_text: It is derived from the very first word wadh-dhariyat, which implies that it is a Surah which begins with the word adh-dhariyat.
text:
It is derived from the very first word wadh-dhariyat, which implies that it is a Surah which begins with the word adh-dhariyat.

Period of Revelation

The subject matter and the style clearly show that it was sent down in the period when although the Holy Prophet's invitation was being resisted and opposed with denial and ridicule and false accusations stubbornly, persecution had not yet started. Therefore, this Surah also seems to have been revealed in the same period in which the Surah Qaf was revealed.

Subject Matter and Topics

The Surah mostly deals with the Hereafter, and in the end it presents the invitation to Tauhid. In addition, the people have also been warned that refusal to accept the message of the Prophets and persistence in the concepts and creeds of ignorance have proved to be disastrous for those nations themselves which have adopted this attitude and way of life in the past.

About the Hereafter what this Surah presents in short but pithy sentences is this: The people's different and conflicting beliefs about the end of human life are themselves an express proof that none of these beliefs and creeds is based on knowledge; everyone by himself has formed an ideology on the basis of conjecture and made the same his creed. Someone thought that there would be no life-after-death; someone believed in the life- after-death, but in the form of the transmigration of souls someone believed in the life hereafter and the meting out of the rewards and punishments but invented different sorts of props and supports to escape retribution. About a question of such vital and fundamental importance a wrong view of which renders man's whole life-work wrong and waste and ruins his future for ever, it would be a disastrous folly to build an ideology only on the basis of speculation and conjecture, without knowledge. It would mean that man should remain involved in a grave
misunderstanding, pass his whole life in the heedlessness of error, and after death should suddenly meet with a situation for which he had made no preparation at all. There is only one way of forming the right opinion about such a question, and it is this: Man should seriously ponder over the knowledge about the Hereafter that the Prophet of Allah is conveying to him from Him, and should study carefully the system of the earth and heavens and his own existence: and should see whether the evidence of that knowledge's being sound and correct is afforded by everything around him or not. In this regard, the arrangement of the wind and rain, the structure of the earth and the creatures found on it, man's own self, the creation of the heavens and of everything in the world in the form of pairs have been presented as evidence of the Hereafter, and instances have been cited from human history to show that the temper of the empire of the Universe requires that the law of retribution must
operate here.

After this, giving the invitation to Tauhid briefly, it has been said : "Your Creator has not created you for the service of others but for His own service. He is not like your false gods, which receive sustenance from you and godhead of which cannot function without your help, but He is a God Who is the Sustainer of all, Who does not stand in need of sustenance from anyone and Whose Godhead is functioning by His own power and might.

In this very connection, it has also been stated that whenever the Prophets of Allah have been opposed and resisted, they have not been opposed and resisted on the basis of any rational ground but on the basis of the same obduracy and stubbornness and false pride that is being shown against the Prophet Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him), and there is no other motive for it than rebellion and arrogance. Then the Holy Prophet has been instructed not to bother about the rebels but to go on performing his mission of invitation and admonition, for it is useful and beneficial for the believers although it may not be so for the other people. As for the wicked people who still persist in their rebellion, they should know that their predecessors who followed the same way of life, have already received their shares of the punishment, and these people's share of the punishment has been made ready for them.
description: The surah that opens with the oath of the Divine One swearing by The Scattering winds that stream far and wide bearing the rain clouds of His mercy. It takes its name from verse 1, which mentions the “scatterers” (dhāriyāt). The surah gives several signs of nature as proof of the Resurrection, among them the scattering winds. The disbelievers are reminded of the fate that befell previous rebellious generations and the Prophet is urged to carry on reminding.The surah is also known as: Scattering (Winds), The Dispersers, The Dispersing, The Scattering Winds, The Winds, The Winds That Scatter, Winnowing (Winds).

Albanian.verse 51:4: dhe pasha engjëjt që shpërndajnë urdhërat, -
Albanian.verse 51:5: me të vërtetë, është e sigurt ajo që ju premtohet,
Albanian.verse 51:6: dhe çdo shpërblim (i premtuar) do të ndodhë!
Albanian.verse 51:7: Pasha qiellin e stolisur me yje,
Albanian.verse 51:8: ju jeni të larmishëm në fjalë,
Albanian.verse 51:9: prej tij (Pejgamberit ose Kur’anit) është shmangur ai që ka qenë i shmangur (edhe më parë).
Albanian.verse 51:11: Ata që janë thelluar në injorancë (dhe harrojnë ringjalljen).
Albanian.verse 51:12: Ata pyesin: “Kur do të jetë Dita e shpërblimit?”
Albanian.verse 51:13: (Do të jetë) atë Ditë kur ata do të përcëllohen në zjarr!
Albanian.verse 51:14: (U thuhet atyre): “Shijoni dënimin tuaj! Ky (dënim) është ai që e nxitojshit!”
Albanian.verse 51:15: Ata që i druajnë Perëndisë, me të vërtetë, do të jenë në kopshte dhe burime,
Albanian.verse 51:16: duke marrë atë që ua ka dhuruar Zoti i tyre, meqë ata, me të vërtetë, më parë kanë qenë bamirës,
Albanian.verse 51:17: ata, kanë fjetur pak natën (duke iu lutur Perëndisë)
Albanian.verse 51:18: po dhe në agim kërkonin falje,
Albanian.verse 51:19: e, në pasuritë e tyre ka pasur pjesë për lypësit dhe nevojtarët.
Albanian.verse 51:20: Në Tokë ka argumente (të shumta) për ata që besojnë qëndrueshëm,
Albanian.verse 51:21: po edhe në ju – a nuk shihni vallë?
Albanian.verse 51:22: E në qiell është furnizimi dhe premtimi juaj.
Albanian.verse 51:23: Dhe, Pasha Zotin e qiellit dhe të Tokës, kjo është vërtetë e saktë, ashtu si është e vërtetë (aftësia e) të folurit tuaj.
Albanian.verse 51:24: A të ka arritur ty lajmi për mysafirët e ndershëm të Ibrahimit?
Albanian.verse 51:25: Kur ata hynë tek ai, e i thanë: “Selam (Paqë! – shpëtimi u qoftë!)” dhe ai u tha: “Selam (Paqë! Qofshi të shpëtuar!)” Ju jeni – (tha në vetvete) popull i panjohur!”
Albanian.verse 51:26: Dhe, pa u hetuar, ai shkoi te njerëzit e shtëpisë dhe solli viç të majmë (të pjekur),
Albanian.verse 51:27: e ua afroi atyre, e u tha: “A s’po hani?”
Albanian.verse 51:28: Dhe, ndjeu frikë prej tyre, (e) ata i thanë: “Mos u friko!” dhe e sihariquan atë (se do t’i lindë) një djalë i dijshëm.
Albanian.verse 51:29: Dhe, u duk gruaja e tij, duke thërritur dhe duke e rrahur fytyrën, e tha: “Vallë, unë plaka, sterile (a mund) të lind?!
Albanian.verse 51:30: Ata thanë: “Kështu ka thënë Zoti yt. Ai, me të vërtetë, është i Gjithëdijshëm dhe i Plotëdijshëm”.
Albanian.verse 51:31: (Ibrahimi u tha atyre): “Çfarë është obligimi juaj, o pejgamberë?”
Albanian.verse 51:32: Ata thanë: “Na jemi dërguar te një popull mëkatar,
Albanian.verse 51:33: për të hudhur gurë mbi ta prej (baltës) së forcuar,
Albanian.verse 51:34: të shënuar te Zoti yt për ata që e kalojnë kufirin (në të këqia)
Albanian.verse 51:35: Dhe, Ne i nxorëm ata besimtarë që ishin aty (në atë vendbanim) –
Albanian.verse 51:36: e në të kemi gjetur vetëm një shtëpi muslimane –
Albanian.verse 51:37: dhe, në të – kemi lënë argument (shenjë) për ata që i druajnë dënimit të dhembshëm.
Albanian.verse 51:38: Dhe, ne kemi sjellë këshillë edhe te Musai kur ia dërguam atë – Faraonit, me argument të qartë,
Albanian.verse 51:39: e u shmang (Faraoni), duke u mbështetur në pushtetin e vet, dhe tha: “(Ai është) magjistar ose i çmendur!”
Albanian.verse 51:40: Dhe, ne e kapëm atë dhe ushtrinë e tij dhe e hodhëm në det; ai është i qortuar (mëkatar).
Albanian.verse 51:41: (Dhe, Ne, kemi dhënë këshillë mbi ngjarjen) e Adit, kur e dërguam frymën shkatërruese mbi ta,
Albanian.verse 51:42: e cila nuk kurseu asgjë ngado që kaloi, e që të mos e ketë bërë si kalbësirë.
Albanian.verse 51:43: Edhe për Themudin, kur iu tha atyre: “Kënaquni një kohë!”
Albanian.verse 51:44: E, u madhështuan ndaj urdhërave të Perëndisë, e pastaj i goditi rrufeja (zëri i tmerrshëm), e ata e shikonin atë (dënimin),
Albanian.verse 51:45: dhe nuk mundën as të ngritën, as të mbrohen prej dënimit.
Albanian.verse 51:46: Edhe për popullin e Nuhut, që më parë (i kemi shkatërruar). Me të vërtetë, ata kanë qenë popull mëkatar!
Albanian.verse 51:47: Ne, e kemi ndërtuar qiellin me pushtetin Tonë, e Ne, me të vërtetë, jemi të pushtetshëm edhe më tepër,
Albanian.verse 51:48: dhe Tokën e kemi shtruar – sa i mrekullueshëm është Ai që e ka shtruar! –
Albanian.verse 51:49: dhe, prej çdo gjëje kemi krijuar çifte, që të meditoni ju!
Albanian.verse 51:50: Andaj, mbështetuni te Perëndia, se unë, me të vërtetë, jam dërguar te ju – prej Tij, paralajmërues i qartë;
Albanian.verse 51:51: Dhe, mos i përshkruani Perëndisë zot tjetër, se unë, me të vërtetë, jam dërguar te ju – prej Tij, paralajmërues i qartë!”
Albanian.verse 51:52: Po ashtu, nuk ka ardhur as para tyre asnjë pejgamber, e që të mos thonin (për te): “Është magjistar”, apo: “Është i çmendur!”
Albanian.verse 51:53: Vallë, a mos ia kanë rekomanduar këtë njëri-tjetrit? Jo, por ata janë popull rebel,
Albanian.verse 51:54: e, shmangu prej tyre; ti nuk do të qortohesh për këtë,
Albanian.verse 51:55: dhe (vazhdoje) këshillimin, se, me të vërtetë, këshilla u bën dobi besimtarëve.
Albanian.verse 51:56: Xhindët dhe njerëzit i kam krijuar vetëm që të Më adhurojnë,
Albanian.verse 51:57: Unë nuk kërkoj prej tyre furnizim, as nuk dëshiroj që të Më ushqejnë,
Albanian.verse 51:58: furnizimin e jep vetëm Perëndia, i Fuqishmi, i Paluhatshmi!
Albanian.verse 51:59: Me të vërtetë, për ata që kanë bërë zullum, kanë pjesë (të dënimit), të ngjashëm pjesës së shokëve të tyre që kanë qenë si ata, e le të mos e nxitojnë atë (dënimin),
Albanian.verse 51:60: sepse, mjerë për mohuesit prej Ditës që u është premtuar!

Amharic.verse 51:7: የ(ከዋክብት) መንገዶች ባለቤት በኾነችው ሰማይ እምላለሁ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:8: እናንተ (የመካ ሰዎች) በተለያየ ቃል ውስጥ ናችሁ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:11: እነዚያ እነርሱ በሚሸፍን ስሕተተ ውስጥ ዘንጊዎች የኾኑት፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:12: የዋጋ መስጫው ቀን መቼ እንደ ኾነ ይጠይቃሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:14: «መከራችሁን ቅመሱ፤ ይህ ያ በእርሱ ትቻኮሉበት የነበራችሁት ነው» (ይባላሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:15: አላህን ፈሪዎቹ በአትክልቶችና በምንጮች ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:16: ያንን ጌታቸው የሰጣቸውን ተቀባዮች ኾነው፤ (በገነት ውስጥ ይኾናሉ)፡፡ እነርሱ ከዚህ በፊት መልካም ሰሪዎች ነበሩና፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:19: በገንዘቦቻቸውም ውስጥ ለለማኝና (ከልመና) ለተከለከለም (በችሮታቸው) መብት አልለ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:20: በምድርም ውስጥ ለሚያረጋግጡ ሰዎች ምልክቶች አልሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:22: ሲሳያችሁም የምትቀጠሩትም (ፍዳና ምንዳ) በሰማይ ውስጥ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:23: በሰማይና በምድር ጌታም እምላለሁ፡፡ እርሱ እናንተ እንደምትናገሩት ብጤ እርግጠኛ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:25: በእርሱ ላይ በገቡና «ሰለም» ባሉ ጊዜ (አስታውስ)፡፡ «ሰላም ያልታወቃችሁ ሕዝቦች ናችሁ፤» አላቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:26: ወደ ቤተሰቡም ተዘነበለ፤» ወዲያውም የሰባ ወይፈንን አመጣ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:28: ከእነርሱ መፍራትንም በልቡ አሳደረ፡፡ «አትፍራ» አሉት፡፡ በዐዋቂ ወጣት ልጅም አበሰሩት፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:29: ሚስቱም እየጮኸች መጣች፡፡ ፊቷንም መታች፡፡ «መካን አሮጊት ነኝ» አለችም፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:30: እንደዚህ ጌታሽ ብሏል፡፡ «እነሆ እርሱ ጥበባ ዐዋቂ ነውና» አሏት፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:31: «እናንተ መልክተኞች ሆይ! ታዲያ ነገራችሁ ምንድን ነው?» አላቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:33: በእነርሱ ላይ ከጭቃ የኾኑን ድንጋዮች ልንለቅባቸው (ተላክን)፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:34: በጌታህ ዘንድ ለድንበር አላፊዎቹ (በየስማቸው) ምልክት የተደረገባት ስትኾን፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:36: በውስጧም ከሙስሊሞች ከአንድ ቤት (ቤተሰቦች) በስተቀር አላገኘንም፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:37: በውስጧም ለእነዚያ አሳማሚውን ቅጣት ለሚፈሩት ምልክትን አስቀረን፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:38: በሙሳም (ወሬ) ውስጥ ወደ ፈርዖን በግልጽ ማስረጃ በላክነው ጊዜ (ምልክትን አደረግን)፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:39: ከድጋፉ (ከሰራዊቱ) ጋርም (ከእምነት) ዞረ፡፡ (እርሱ) «ድግምተኛ ወይም ዕብድ ነው» አለም፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:40: እርሱንም ሰራዊቱንም ያዝናቸው፡፡ እርሱ ተወቃሽ ሲኾን በባሕር ውስጥም ጣልናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:41: በዓድም በእነርሱ ላይ መካንን ነፋስ በላክን ጊዜ (ምልክት አልለ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:42: በላዩ ላይ የመጣችበትን ማንኛውንም ነገር እንደ በሰበሰ አጥንት ያደረገችው ብትኾን እንጂ አትተወውም፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:43: በሰሙድም ለእነርሱ «እስከ ጊዜ (ሞታችሁ) ድረስ ተጣቀሙ» በተባሉ ጊዜ (ምልክት አልለ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:44: ከጌታቸው ትዕዛዝም ኮሩ፡፡ እነርሱም እያዩ ጩኸት ያዘቻቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:46: የኑሕንም ሕዝቦች ከዚህ በፊት (አጠፋን)፡፡ እነርሱ አመጸኞች ሕዝቦች ነበሩና፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:47: ሰማይንም በኀይል ገነባናት፡፡ እኛም በእርግጥ ቻዮች ነን፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:49: ትገነዘቡም ዘንድ ከነገሩ ሁሉ ሁለት (ተቃራኒ) ዓይነትን ፈጠርን፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:50: «ወደ አላህም ሽሹ፤ እኔ ለእናንተ ከርሱ ግልጽ አስጠንቃቂ ነኝና» (በላቸው)፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:51: ከአላህም ጋር ሌላን አምላክ አታድርጉ፡፡ እኔ ለእናንተ ከእርሱ (የተላክሁ) ግልጽ አስፈራሪ ነኝና፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:52: (ነገሩ) እንደዚሁ ነው፡፡ እነዚያን ከእነርሱ በፊት የነበሩትን ከመልክተኛ ማንም አልመጣቸውም፡፡ (እርሱ) «ድግምተኛ ወይም ዕብድ ነው» ያሉ ቢኾኑ እንጂ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:53: በእርሱ (በዚህ ቃል) አደራ ተባብለዋልን? አይደለም፤ እነርሱ ጥጋበኞች ሕዝቦች ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:54: ከእነርሱም (ክርክር) ዘወር በል፤ (ተዋቸው)፡፡ አንተ ምንም ተወቃሽ አይደለህምና፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:56: ጋኔንንና ሰውንም ሊግገዙኝ እንጅ ለሌላ አልፈጠርኳቸውም፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:57: ከነርሱም ምንም ሲሳይ አልፈልግም፡፡ ሊመግቡኝም አልሻም፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:58: አላህ እርሱ ሲሳይን ሰጪ የብርቱ ኀይል ባለቤት ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:59: ለእነዚያም ለበደሉት እንደ ጓደኞቻቸው ፋንታ ብጤ (የቅጣት) ፋንታ አልላቸው፡፡ ስለዚህ አያስቸኩሉኝ፡፡
Amharic.verse 51:60: ለነዚያም ለካዱት ከዚያ ከሚቀጠሩት ቀናቸው ወዮላቸው፡

Arabic.verse 51:52: (ٌنوُنْجَم ْوَأ ٌرِحاَس اوُلاَق اَّلِإ ٍلوُسَّر نِّم مِهِلْبَق نِم َنيِذَّلا ىَتَأ اَم َكِلَٰذَك

Azerbaijani.verse 51:7: And olsun gözəl görünüşü olan səmaya!
Azerbaijani.verse 51:9: Ondan (Qurandan və Peyğəmbərdən) dönən kimsə döndərilər.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:11: O kəslər ki, cəhalət içində olan qafillərdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:12: Onlar Haqq-hesab gününün nə vaxt olacağını soruşurlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:13: O gün onlara odda əzab veriləcəkdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:14: Onlara deyiləcək: “Dadın əzabınızı! Sizin tez-tələsik gəlməsini istədiyiniz şey budur!”
Azerbaijani.verse 51:15: Şübhəsiz ki, müttəqilər Cənnət bağlarında və bulaqlar başında olacaqlar,
Azerbaijani.verse 51:16: öz Rəbbinin onlara verdiyini alacaqlar. Həqiqətən, onlar bundan əvvəl yaxşı iş görən adamlar olmuşdular.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:17: Onlar gecələr ibadət edib az yatırdılar.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:19: Onların mal-dövlətində dilənçinin və yoxsulun payı vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:20: Qəti inananlar üçün yer üzündə dəlillər vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:21: Sizin özünüzdə də dəlillər vardır. Məgər görmürsünüz?
Azerbaijani.verse 51:22: Sizin ruziniz və sizə vəd olunan şeylər göydədir.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:23: Göyün və yerin Rəbbinə and olsun ki, bu vəd sizin danışmağa qüdrətiniz olduğu kimi həqiqətdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:24: İbrahimin möhtərəm qonaqlarının əhvalatı sənə gəlib çatdımı?
Azerbaijani.verse 51:25: Onlar onun yanına daxil olub: “Sənə salam olsun!”– dedilər. İbrahim: “Sizə də salam olsun! Siz yad adamlara oxşayırsınız!”– dedi.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:26: O, təşviş içində ailəsinin yanına getdi və kök bir buzov qızardıb gətirdi.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:28: O, qonaqların yemədiklərini görüb onlardan qorxuya düşdü. Onlar: “Qorxma!”– dedilər və ona elmli bir oğlan uşağı ilə müjdə verdilər.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:29: Zövcəsi qışqırıb üz-gözünə vura-vura dedi: “Axı mən sonsuz qoca qarıyam!”
Azerbaijani.verse 51:30: Onlar dedilər: “Sənin Rəbbin belə demişdir. Həqiqətən, O, Müdrikdir, Biləndir!”
Azerbaijani.verse 51:31: İbrahim dedi: “Sizin işiniz nədir, ey elçilər?”
Azerbaijani.verse 51:32: Onlar dedilər: “Biz günahkar bir qövmə göndərilmişik ki,
Azerbaijani.verse 51:34: həddi aşanlar üçün sənin Rəbbinin yanında nişan qoyulmuş daşlar!”
Azerbaijani.verse 51:35: Biz orada olan möminləri o kənddən çıxartdıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:36: Amma orada bir evdən başqa müsəlman tapmadıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:37: Ağrılı-acılı əzabdan qorxanlar üçün orada bir əlamət qoyduq.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:38: Musanın əhvalatında da ibrət vardır. O zaman Biz onu Fironun yanına aydın bir dəlillə göndərmişdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:39: O, öz camaatı ilə birlikdə üz çevirib: “Bu sehrbazdır, ya da dəlidir!”– dedi.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:40: Biz Fironu və əsgərlərini yaxalayıb dənizə atdıq. O, qınanmağa layiq idi.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:41: Ad qövmünün hekayətində də ibrət vardır. O zaman Biz onların üstünə xeyir-bərəkətsiz bir külək göndərmişdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:42: O külək üstündən keçdiyi hər bir şeyi sovurub külə döndərirdi.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:43: Səmud qövmünün hekayətində də ibrət vardır. O zaman onlara: “Müəyyən vaxtadək dolanıb-keçinin!”– deyilmişdi.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:44: Onlar öz Rəbbinin əmrindən çıxdılar və onları gözləri baxa-baxa ildırım vurdu.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:45: Onlar ayağa qalxa bilmədilər və onlara kömək edən də olmadı.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:46: Daha əvvəl Nuh qövmünü məhv etdik. Çünki onlar fasiq adamlar idilər.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:47: Biz göyü qüdrətlə yaratdıq və Biz onu genişləndiririk.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:48: Yeri də Biz döşədik. Nə gözəl döşəyənlərik Biz!
Azerbaijani.verse 51:49: Biz hər şeydən erkək və dişi olmaqla cütlər yaratdıq ki, bəlkə, düşünüb ibrət alasınız.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:50: De: “Allaha tərəf qaçın! Mən sizi Onunla açıq-aşkar qorxudub xəbərdar edənəm!
Azerbaijani.verse 51:51: Allahla yanaşı başqa bir məbud qəbul etməyin. Mən sizi Onunla açıq-aşkar qorxudub xəbərdar edənəm!”
Azerbaijani.verse 51:52: Beləcə, onlardan əvvəlkilərə də elə bir elçi gəlmədi ki, onun barəsində: “Sehrbazdır, ya da dəlidir!”– deməsinlər.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:53: Onlar bunu bir-birinə vəsiyyətmi etmişlər? Xeyr, onlar həddi aşan adamlardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:54: Artıq onlardan üz döndər! Sən buna görə qınanmazsan.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:55: Sən xatırlat! Çünki xatırlatmaq möminlərə fayda verir.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:56: Mən cinləri və insanları ancaq Mənə ibadət etmək üçün yaratdım.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:57: Mən onlardan ruzi istəmirəm. Mən onlardan Məni yedirtmələrini də istəmirəm.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:58: Həqiqətən, Allah ruzi verəndir, qüvvət sahibidir, Mətindir.
Azerbaijani.verse 51:59: Şübhəsiz ki, zülm edənləri həmtaylarının qisməti kimi bir qismət gözləyir. Qoy onlar Məni tələsdirməsinlər!
Azerbaijani.verse 51:60: Onlara vəd olunmuş Gündən ötrü vay kafirlərin halına!

Bengali.verse 51:9: যে ভ্রষ্ট, সেই এ থেকে মুখ ফিরায়,
Bengali.verse 51:12: তারা জিজ্ঞাসা করে, কেয়ামত কবে হবে?
Bengali.verse 51:14: তোমরা তোমাদের শাস্তি আস্বাদন কর। তোমরা একেই ত্বরান্বিত করতে চেয়েছিল।
Bengali.verse 51:16: এমতাবস্থায় যে, তারা গ্রহণ করবে যা তাদের পালনকর্তা তাদেরকে দেবেন। নিশ্চয় ইতিপূর্বে তারা ছিল সৎকর্মপরায়ণ,
Bengali.verse 51:17: তারা রাত্রির সামান্য অংশেই নিদ্রা যেত,
Bengali.verse 51:18: রাতের শেষ প্রহরে তারা ক্ষমাপ্রার্থনা করত,
Bengali.verse 51:19: এবং তাদের ধন-সম্পদে প্রার্থী ও বঞ্চিতের হক ছিল।
Bengali.verse 51:21: এবং তোমাদের নিজেদের মধ্যেও, তোমরা কি অনুধাবন করবে না?
Bengali.verse 51:22: আকাশে রয়েছে তোমাদের রিযিক ও প্রতিশ্রুত সবকিছু।
Bengali.verse 51:23: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলের পালনকর্তার কসম, তোমাদের কথাবার্তার মতই এটা সত্য।
Bengali.verse 51:24: আপনার কাছে ইব্রাহীমের সম্মানিত মেহমানদের বৃত্তান্ত এসেছে কি?
Bengali.verse 51:25: যখন তারা তাঁর কাছে উপস্থিত হয়ে বললঃ সালাম, তখন সে বললঃ সালাম। এরা তো অপরিচিত লোক।
Bengali.verse 51:26: অতঃপর সে গ্রহে গেল এবং একটি ঘৃতেপক্ক মোটা গোবৎস নিয়ে হাযির হল।
Bengali.verse 51:27: সে গোবৎসটি তাদের সামনে রেখে বললঃ তোমরা আহার করছ না কেন?
Bengali.verse 51:28: অতঃপর তাদের সম্পর্কে সে মনে মনে ভীত হলঃ তারা বললঃ ভীত হবেন না। তারা তাঁকে একট জ্ঞানীগুণী পুত্র সন্তানের সুসংবাদ দিল।
Bengali.verse 51:29: অতঃপর তাঁর স্ত্রী চীৎকার করতে করতে সামনে এল এবং মুখ চাপড়িয়ে বললঃ আমি তো বৃদ্ধা, বন্ধ্যা।
Bengali.verse 51:30: তারা বললঃ তোমার পালনকর্তা এরূপই বলেছেন। নিশ্চয় তিনি প্রজ্ঞাময়, সর্বজ্ঞ।
Bengali.verse 51:31: ইব্রাহীম বললঃ হে প্রেরিত ফেরেশতাগণ, তোমাদের উদ্দেশ্য কি?
Bengali.verse 51:32: তারা বললঃ আমরা এক অপরাধী সম্প্রদায়ের প্রতি প্রেরিত হয়েছি,
Bengali.verse 51:33: যাতে তাদের উপর মাটির ঢিলা নিক্ষেপ করি।
Bengali.verse 51:34: যা সীমাতিক্রমকারীদের জন্যে আপনার পালনকর্তার কাছে চিহিߦ#2468; আছে।
Bengali.verse 51:35: অতঃপর সেখানে যারা ঈমানদার ছিল, আমি তাদেরকে উদ্ধার করলাম।
Bengali.verse 51:36: এবং সেখানে একটি গৃহ ব্যতীত কোন মুসলমান আমি পাইনি।
Bengali.verse 51:37: যারা যন্ত্রণাদায়ক শাস্তিকে ভয় করে, আমি তাদের জন্যে সেখানে একটি নিদর্শন রেখেছি।
Bengali.verse 51:38: এবং নিদর্শন রয়েছে মূসার বৃত্তান্তে; যখন আমি তাকে সুস্পষ্ট প্রমাণসহ ফেরাউনের কাছে প্রেরণ করেছিলাম।
Bengali.verse 51:39: অতঃপর সে শক্তিবলে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিল এবং বললঃ সে হয় যাদুকর, না হয় পাগল।
Bengali.verse 51:40: অতঃপর আমি তাকে ও তার সেনাবাহিনীকে পাকড়াও করলাম এবং তাদেরকে সমুদ্রে নিক্ষেপ করলাম। সে ছিল অভিযুক্ত।
Bengali.verse 51:41: এবং নিদর্শন রয়েছে তাদের কাহিনীতে; যখন আমি তাদের উপর প্রেরণ করেছিলাম অশুভ বায়ু।
Bengali.verse 51:42: এই বায়ু যার উপর দিয়ে প্রবাহিত হয়েছিলঃ তাকেই চুর্ণ-বিচুর্ণ করে দিয়েছিল।
Bengali.verse 51:43: আরও নিদর্শন রয়েছে সামূদের ঘটনায়; যখন তাদেরকে বলা হয়েছিল, কিছুকাল মজা লুটে নাও।
Bengali.verse 51:44: অতঃপর তারা তাদের পালনকর্তার আদেশ অমান্য করল এবং তাদের প্রতি বজ্রঘাত হল এমতাবস্থায় যে, তারা তা দেখেছিল।
Bengali.verse 51:45: অতঃপর তারা দাঁড়াতে সক্ষম হল না এবং কোন প্রতিকারও করতে পারল না।
Bengali.verse 51:46: আমি ইতিপূর্বে নূহের সম্প্রদায়কে ধ্বংস করেছি। নিশ্চিতই তারা ছিল পাপাচারী সম্প্রদায়।
Bengali.verse 51:47: আমি স্বীয় ক্ষমতাবলে আকাশ নির্মাণ করেছি এবং আমি অবশ্যই ব্যাপক ক্ষমতাশালী।
Bengali.verse 51:48: আমি ভূমিকে বিছিয়েছি। আমি কত সুন্দরভাবেই না বিছাতে সক্ষম।
Bengali.verse 51:49: আমি প্রত্যেক বস্তু জোড়ায় জোড়ায় সৃষ্টি করেছি, যাতে তোমরা হৃদয়ঙ্গম কর।
Bengali.verse 51:50: অতএব, আল্লাহর দিকে ধাবিত হও। আমি তাঁর তরফ থেকে তোমাদের জন্যে সুস্পষ্ট সতর্ককারী।
Bengali.verse 51:51: তোমরা আল্লাহর সাথে কোন উপাস্য সাব্যস্ত করো না। আমি তাঁর পক্ষ থেকে তোমাদের জন্য সুস্পষ্ট সতর্ককারী।
Bengali.verse 51:52: এমনিভাবে, তাদের পূর্ববর্তীদের কাছে যখনই কোন রসূল আগমন করেছে, তারা বলছেঃ যাদুকর, না হয় উম্মাদ।
Bengali.verse 51:53: তারা কি একে অপরকে এই উপদেশই দিয়ে গেছে? বস্তুতঃ ওরা দুষ্ট সম্প্রদায়।
Bengali.verse 51:54: অতএব, আপনি ওদের থেকে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিন। এতে আপনি অপরাধী হবেন না।
Bengali.verse 51:55: এবং বোঝাতে থাকুন; কেননা, বোঝানো মুমিনদের উপকারে আসবে।
Bengali.verse 51:56: আমার এবাদত করার জন্যই আমি মানব ও জিন জাতি সৃষ্টি করেছি।
Bengali.verse 51:57: আমি তাদের কাছে জীবিকা চাই না এবং এটাও চাই না যে, তারা আমাকে আহার্য যোগাবে।
Bengali.verse 51:58: আল্লাহ তা’আলাই তো জীবিকাদাতা শক্তির আধার, পরাক্রান্ত।
Bengali.verse 51:59: অতএব, এই যালেমদের প্রাপ্য তাই, যা ওদের অতীত সহচরদের প্রাপ্য ছিল। কাজেই ওরা যেন আমার কাছে তা তাড়াতাড়ি না চায়।
Bengali.verse 51:60: অতএব, কাফেরদের জন্যে দুর্ভোগ সেই দিনের, যেদিনের প্রতিশ্রুতি ওদেরকে দেয়া হয়েছে।

Berber Amazigh.verse 51:5: Ar ayen i wen ippuâahden, d tidep.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:13: Ass ideg, ara ppuhewlen di tmes:
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:15: Ih, wid ipêezziben, di leonanat akked tliwa;
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:16: Ïîfen ayen i sen Ifka Mass nnsen. Ih, nitni llan, iu$ lêal, d lâuûam.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:19: deg wayla nnsen: amur i umappar akked ume$bun.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:20: U di tmurt, issekniyen i wid ipputebbten.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:21: Llant deg iman nnwen. Aâni ur tepwalim ara?
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:22: U deg igenni, ôôeéq nnwen, akked wayen i wen ippuwaââden.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:23: S Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, ar neppa d tidep, am akken kunwi tepmeslayem!
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:24: Ma tebbwev ik id tedyant inebgawen ukyisen n Ibôahim?
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:25: Kecmen $uôes, nnan as: "tifrat"! Inna: "tifrat a wid ur nessin!"
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:26: Inser ar twacult is, ibbwi d aâjmi iqebbwan.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:27: Iqeôb asen t id; inna: "day ur teppeppem ara"?
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:28: Iêus iugad iten. Nnan as: "ur ppagwad"! D$a beccôen t s uqcic amusnaw
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:29: Tqeôb ed tmeîîut is, tsu$, tewwet deg udem is, tenna d: "tam$aôt tiâiqeôt?"
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:30: Nnan: "akka id Inna Mass im. Ih, Neppa, d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw".
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:31: Inna: "anwa ay d awal nnwen, a yimceggâan"?
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:32: Nnan: "nekwni neppuceggaâ d ar ugdud ibe$wviyen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:33: Iwakken a ten neôoem s uéôu n talaxt
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:34: i ipwaôecmen s$uô Mass ik i ucmiten".
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:35: Nessuffe$ kra illan, degs, n lmumnin.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:36: Nufa kan degs, yiwen uxxam n imvuâen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:37: Neooa p id d assekni i wid iugaden aâaqeb aqeôêan.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:38: I di Musa, mi t id Nuzen i Ferâun, s udabu n ûûeê.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:39: Iaâûa, akked imalalen is, inna: "d aseêêar, ne$ d aôehbani".
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:40: Neddem it, neppa akked iâsekriwen is, Nveggeô iten ar yill. Tiyta degs.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:41: I di Âad, mi sen Nuzen avu asexvi.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:42: Ur ippaooa ayen immuger, alamma irra t am rrmim.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:43: I Tamud, mi pwanecden: "siwa tallit ara tezhum".
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:44: Âuûan lameô n Mass nnsen. Tewwet iten id ssiâqa, nitni la pwalin.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:45: Ur zmiren a d kren, ur pwasellken.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:46: Agdud n Nuê, uqbel, llan, s tidep, d agdud iballa$en.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:47: Igenni, Nebna t s loehd, d Nekwni it Issewsaân.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:48: Tamurt, Nessa p. Ay gerzen Wid Itessun!
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:49: Di yal cci, Nexleq tayuga, ahat a d tesmektim.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:50: Ihi, srifget ar Öebbi. Nek, ih, s$uôeS ar $uôwen, d aneddaô ipbegginen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:51: Ur sâut, ar tama n Öebbi, ôebbi nniven! Nek, ih, s$uôeS ar $uôwen, d aneddaô ipbegginen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:52: Akka, ur iusi umazan ar wid i ten id izwaren, mebla ma nnan as: "d aseêêar ne$ d aôehbani".
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:53: Day ppuweûûan $ef waya? Xaîi, nitni d agdud izegren tilas.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:54: Ïîixxeô asen; ur deg k tiyta.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:55: Smektay ed. Asmekti, s tidep, infaâ lmumnin.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:56: Xelqe$ leonun akked imdanen, iwakken kan ad iyI âabden.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:57: Ur b$i$ segsen ôôeéq, ur b$i$ ad iyi cceççen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:58: Öebbi, s tidep, d Aôeééaq, d Bu tezmert n ûûeê.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:59: Ih, i wid idensen, amur am umur imeddukwal nnsen. Ulay$eô iyI $eûben.
Berber Amazigh.verse 51:60: A tawa$it n wid ijehlen, ilmend n wass i sen ippuwaââden!

Bosnian.verse 51:1: Tako Mi onih koji pušu snažno,
Bosnian.verse 51:5: istina je, zaista, ono čime vam se prijeti,
Bosnian.verse 51:6: nagrada i kazna sigurno će biti!
Bosnian.verse 51:7: Tako Mi neba punog zvjezdanih puteva,
Bosnian.verse 51:9: od njega se odvraća onaj za kog se znalo da će se odvratiti.
Bosnian.verse 51:11: koji su, utonuli u neznanje, ravnodušni!
Bosnian.verse 51:13: Onoga Dana kada se u vatri budu pržili!
Bosnian.verse 51:14: "Iskusite kaznu svoju – to je ono što ste požurivali!"
Bosnian.verse 51:15: Oni koji su se Allaha bojali – u džennetskim baščama će, među izvorima, boraviti,
Bosnian.verse 51:16: primaće ono što im Gospodar njihov bude darovao, jer, oni su prije toga dobra djela činili,
Bosnian.verse 51:18: i u praskozorje oprost od grijeha molili,
Bosnian.verse 51:19: a u imecima njihovim bio je udio i za onoga koji prosi i za onoga koji ne prosi.
Bosnian.verse 51:20: Na Zemlji su dokazi za one koji čvrsto vjeruju,
Bosnian.verse 51:21: a i u vama samima – zar ne vidite? –
Bosnian.verse 51:22: a na nebu je opskrba vaša i ono što vam se obećava.
Bosnian.verse 51:23: I, tako Mi Gospodara neba i Zemlje, to je istina, kao što je istina da govorite!
Bosnian.verse 51:24: Da li je doprla do tebe vijest o uvaženih gostima Ibrahimovim
Bosnian.verse 51:25: kada mu oni uđoše i rekoše: "Mir vama!", i on reče: "Mir vama, ljudi neznani!"
Bosnian.verse 51:26: I on neprimijetno ode ukućanima svojim i donese debelo tele,
Bosnian.verse 51:27: i primače im ga: "Zar nećete da jedete?" – upita,
Bosnian.verse 51:28: osjetivši od njih u duši zebnju. "Ne boj se!" – rekoše, i obradovaše ga dječakom koji će učen biti.
Bosnian.verse 51:29: I pojavi se žena njegova uzvikujući i po licu se udarajući, i reče: "Zar ja, stara, nerotkinja?!"
Bosnian.verse 51:30: "Tako je odredio Gospodar tvoj" – rekoše oni – "On je Mudri i Sveznajući."
Bosnian.verse 51:31: "A šta vi hoćete, o izaslanici?" – upita Ibrahim.
Bosnian.verse 51:33: "da sručimo na njih grumenje od ilovače,
Bosnian.verse 51:34: svako obilježeno u Gospodara tvoga za one koji su u razvratu svaku mjeru prešli."
Bosnian.verse 51:35: I Mi iz njega vjernike izvedosmo –
Bosnian.verse 51:36: a u njemu samo jednu kuću muslimansku nađosmo –
Bosnian.verse 51:37: i u njemu za sve one koji se boje patnje neizdržljive znak ostavismo.
Bosnian.verse 51:38: I o Musau, kada ga s očiglednim dokazom faraonu poslasmo,
Bosnian.verse 51:39: a on, uzdajući se u moć svoju, okrenu glavu i reče: "Čarobnjak je ili lud!"
Bosnian.verse 51:40: I Mi i njega i vojske njegove dohvatismo, pa ih u more bacismo, jer je bio osudu zaslužio.
Bosnian.verse 51:41: I o Adu, kada na njih vjetar poslasmo u kome nije bilo nikakva dobra –
Bosnian.verse 51:42: pored čega god je prošao, ništa nije poštedio, sve je u gnjilež pretvorio.
Bosnian.verse 51:43: I o Semudu, kad mu bî rečeno: "Uživajte još neko vrijeme!"
Bosnian.verse 51:44: I oni se oglušiše o naređenje Gospodara svoga, pa ih uništi strašan glas na oči njihove,
Bosnian.verse 51:45: i ne mogaše se ni dići ni od kazne odbraniti.
Bosnian.verse 51:46: I o Nuhovu narodu, davno prije; to, zaista, bijaše narod neposlušni!
Bosnian.verse 51:47: Mi smo nebo moći Svojom sazdali, a Mi, uistinu, još neizmjerno mnogo možemo,
Bosnian.verse 51:48: i Zemlju smo prostrli – tako je divan Onaj koji je prostro! –
Bosnian.verse 51:49: i od svega po par stvaramo da biste vi razmislili!
Bosnian.verse 51:50: "Zato požurite Allahu, ja sam vam od Njega da vas javno upozorim;
Bosnian.verse 51:51: ne prihvaćajte drugog boga osim Allaha, ja sam vam od Njega da vas jasno opomenem!"
Bosnian.verse 51:52: I tako je bilo, ni onima prije ovih nije došao nijedan poslanik, a da nisu rekli: "Čarobnjak je!", ili: "Lud je!"
Bosnian.verse 51:53: Zar su to jedni drugima u amanet ostavljali? Nisu, nego su oni ljudi koji su u zlu svaku mjeru bili prevršili,
Bosnian.verse 51:54: zato ove ostavi, prijekor nećeš zaslužiti,
Bosnian.verse 51:55: i nastavi savjetovati, savjet će vjernicima, doista, koristiti.
Bosnian.verse 51:56: Džine i ljude sam stvorio samo zato da Mi se klanjaju,
Bosnian.verse 51:57: Ja ne tražim od njih opskrbu niti želim da Me hrane,
Bosnian.verse 51:58: opskrbu daje jedino Allah, Moćni i Jaki!
Bosnian.verse 51:59: A nevjernike će stići kazna kao što je stigla i one koji su bili kao oni, i neka Me ne požuruju,
Bosnian.verse 51:60: jer, teško nevjernicima na Dan kojim im se prijeti!

Bulgarian.verse 51:1: Кълна се в отвяващите с веене [ветрове]
Bulgarian.verse 51:5: че е истина това, което ви е обещано!
Bulgarian.verse 51:7: Кълна се в небето, осеяно с пътища!
Bulgarian.verse 51:9: Отклонява се от него онзи, който е бил отклонен.
Bulgarian.verse 51:13: В този Ден върху Огъня ще бъдат измъчвани.
Bulgarian.verse 51:14: “Вкусете своето мъчение! Това е, за което бързахте.”
Bulgarian.verse 51:15: Богобоязливите ще бъдат сред градини и извори,
Bulgarian.verse 51:16: ще взимат онова, което им дарява техният Господ. Преди това те вършеха добро
Bulgarian.verse 51:18: и на развиделяване молеха за опрощение,
Bulgarian.verse 51:19: и в техните имоти имаше дял за просяка и нуждаещия се.
Bulgarian.verse 51:20: За убедените на земята има знамения
Bulgarian.verse 51:21: и в самите вас. Нима не съзирате?
Bulgarian.verse 51:22: На небето има препитание за вас и там е онова, което ви е обещано.
Bulgarian.verse 51:23: А то, кълна се в Господа на небето и на земята, е истина, както това, че говорите.
Bulgarian.verse 51:24: Стигна ли до теб разказът за почетните гости на Ибрахим?
Bulgarian.verse 51:25: Влязоха при него и рекоха: “Мир!” Каза: “Мир!” И си рече: “Непознати хора!”
Bulgarian.verse 51:26: И без да го видят, свърна към своето семейство и дойде с тлъсто [печено] теле,
Bulgarian.verse 51:27: и им го поднесе. Рече: “Ще похапнете ли?”
Bulgarian.verse 51:28: И спотаи страх от тях. Рекоха: “Не се страхувай!” И го благовестиха за знаещ син.
Bulgarian.verse 51:29: И пристъпи жена му с вик, удряйки лицето си, и рече: “Но аз съм бездeтна старица!”
Bulgarian.verse 51:30: Рекоха: “Тъй каза твоят Господ. Той е Премъдрия, Всезнаещия.”
Bulgarian.verse 51:31: Рече: “А какво ви е намерението, о, пратеници?”
Bulgarian.verse 51:33: за да изсипем върху тях камъни от глина,
Bulgarian.verse 51:34: белязани при твоя Господ за прекаляващите.”
Bulgarian.verse 51:35: И изведохме Ние само вярващите, които бяха там.
Bulgarian.verse 51:36: И намерихме там отдадени [на Аллах] само в един дом.
Bulgarian.verse 51:37: И оставихме там знамение за онези, които се страхуват от болезненото мъчение.
Bulgarian.verse 51:38: ... И за Муса, когато го изпратихме при Фараона с явен довод.
Bulgarian.verse 51:39: И се отвърна той със своята опора, и каза: “Магьосник или луд.”
Bulgarian.verse 51:40: И сграбчихме него и войските му, и ги хвърлихме в морето. Вината бе негова.
Bulgarian.verse 51:41: И за адитите, срещу които изпратихме опустошителния вятър...
Bulgarian.verse 51:42: И не остави той нищо, над което премина, без да го превърне в прах.
Bulgarian.verse 51:43: И за самудяните, когато им бе казано: “Наслаждавайте се до време!”
Bulgarian.verse 51:44: И се възгордяха пред повелята на техния Господ, [затова] мълнията ги порази, както си гледаха.
Bulgarian.verse 51:45: И не можаха да се изправят, и не им се помогна.
Bulgarian.verse 51:46: И народа на Нух [погубихме] преди. Те бяха нечестиви хора.
Bulgarian.verse 51:47: И небето изградихме с [Нашата] сила. Ние даваме простор.
Bulgarian.verse 51:48: И земята Ние разстлахме. Колко прекрасно разстиламе!
Bulgarian.verse 51:49: И от всяко нещо сътворихме двойки, за да се поучите!
Bulgarian.verse 51:50: Затова към Аллах се устремете! Аз съм Негов явен предупредител за вас.
Bulgarian.verse 51:51: И не приемайте друг Бог заедно с Аллах! Аз съм Негов явен предупредител за вас.
Bulgarian.verse 51:52: Така и онези преди тях, щом дойдеше пратеник, казваха: “Магьосник или луд.”
Bulgarian.verse 51:53: Нима си завещаваха това един другиму? Не, ала те са престъпващи хора.
Bulgarian.verse 51:54: Отвърни се от тях и не ще бъдеш упрекван!
Bulgarian.verse 51:55: И поучавай! Наистина поучението носи полза на вярващите.
Bulgarian.verse 51:56: Сътворих Аз джиновете и хората единствено за да Ми служат.
Bulgarian.verse 51:57: Не искам от тях препитание и не искам да Ме хранят.
Bulgarian.verse 51:58: Аллах! Той е Даващия препитанието, Владетеля на силата, Всемогъщия.
Bulgarian.verse 51:59: Угнетителите имат участ като участта на техните другари. Затова да не избързват!
Bulgarian.verse 51:60: Горко на неверниците в техния Ден, който им е обещан!

Chinese.verse 51:5: 警告你们的事确是真实的，
Chinese.verse 51:9: 原被阻遏者，将被阻遏，而不得到达他。
Chinese.verse 51:11: 他们浸沉在愚昧之中，他们是昏愦的。
Chinese.verse 51:12: 他们问报应日在什么时候，
Chinese.verse 51:13: 那是他们在火刑上受刑之日。
Chinese.verse 51:14: 你们尝试你们的刑罚吧！这就是你们要求早日实现的。
Chinese.verse 51:15: 敬畏的人们必定在许多乐园中，在许多泉源畔，
Chinese.verse 51:16: 接受他们的主所赏赐的。他们在生前确是行善的，
Chinese.verse 51:17: 他们在夜间只稍稍睡一下，
Chinese.verse 51:18: 他们在黎明时向主求饶，
Chinese.verse 51:19: 他们的财产中，有乞丐和贫民的权利。
Chinese.verse 51:20: 在大地上对于笃信的人们，有许多迹象；
Chinese.verse 51:21: 在你们自身中也有许多迹象，难道你们看不见吗？
Chinese.verse 51:22: 在天上，有你们的给养，也有应许你们的赏罚。
Chinese.verse 51:23: 以天地的主盟誓，这确是真实的，犹如你们能说话一样。
Chinese.verse 51:24: 关于易卜拉欣的受优待的宾客的故事，已来临你了吗？
Chinese.verse 51:25: 当时，他们进去见他，他们说：祝你平安！他说：祝你们平安！他想这些是生客。
Chinese.verse 51:26: 于是他悄悄地走到他的家属那里，拿来一头肥嫩的牛犊，
Chinese.verse 51:27: 他把那牛犊送到客人面前，说：你们怎么不吃呢！
Chinese.verse 51:28: 他为他们而心怀恐惧。他们说：你不要恐惧。他们以一个有学识的儿童向他报喜。
Chinese.verse 51:29: 他的女人便喊叫著走来，她打自己的脸，说：我是一个不能生育的老妇人。
Chinese.verse 51:30: 他们说：你的主是这样说的，他确是至睿的，确是全知的。
Chinese.verse 51:31: 他说：诸位使者啊！你们有什么差事呢？
Chinese.verse 51:32: 他们说：我们确已奉派去惩治一群犯罪的民众，
Chinese.verse 51:33: 我们将因毁灭他们而降下黏土变成的石头，
Chinese.verse 51:34: 那是从你的主那里为过分者而发出的。
Chinese.verse 51:35: 我把城里所有的信士都救了出来，
Chinese.verse 51:36: 我在城里只发现一家归顺者。
Chinese.verse 51:37: 我曾在城里留下一种迹象，以便畏惧痛苦的刑罚的人们用作鉴戒。
Chinese.verse 51:38: 在穆萨的故事里也有一种迹象。当时，我曾派遣他带著一件明证去见法老。
Chinese.verse 51:39: 但法老因有势力故背弃穆萨，他说：这是一个术士，或是一个疯人。
Chinese.verse 51:40: 所以我惩治他和他的军队，而将他们投入海中，他是受责备的。
Chinese.verse 51:41: 在阿德人的故事里，也有一种迹象。当时，我曾使无益的暴风去毁灭他们，
Chinese.verse 51:42: 凡经那暴风吹过的东西，无一不变成破碎的。
Chinese.verse 51:43: 在赛莫德人的故事里，也有一种迹象。当时，有人对他们说：你们暂时享受吧！
Chinese.verse 51:44: 他们曾违抗他们主的命令，故疾雷毁灭了他们，同时，他们眼见刑罚降临，
Chinese.verse 51:45: 他们未能站起，他们也未能自卫。
Chinese.verse 51:46: 以前，我毁灭了努哈的宗族，他们确是悖逆的民众。
Chinese.verse 51:47: 天，我曾以权力建造它，我确是大能的；
Chinese.verse 51:48: 地，我曾铺张它。美哉铺张者！
Chinese.verse 51:49: 我将每种物造成配偶，以便你们觉悟。
Chinese.verse 51:50: 你说：你们应当逃归真主，我对于你们确是一个坦率的警告者。
Chinese.verse 51:51: 你们不要以别的神灵与真主同受崇拜，我对于你们确是一个坦率的警告者。
Chinese.verse 51:52: 他们以前的各民族也象这样，每有一个使者来临他们，他们就说：他是一个术士，或是一个疯人。
Chinese.verse 51:53: 难道他们曾以此话互相嘱咐吗？不然，他们都是悖逆的民众。
Chinese.verse 51:54: 你应当退避他们，你绝不是受责备的。
Chinese.verse 51:55: 你应当教诲众人，因为教诲对于信士们确是有益的。
Chinese.verse 51:56: 我创造精灵和人类，只为要他们崇拜我。
Chinese.verse 51:57: 我不望他们的供给，我也不望他们的奉养。
Chinese.verse 51:58: 真主确是供给万物的，确是有权力的，确是坚定的。
Chinese.verse 51:59: 不义的人们，和他们的朋友一样，必得一份刑罚，所以叫他们不要催促我。
Chinese.verse 51:60: 伤哉不信道的人们！当他们被警告的日子来临的时候。

Danish.verse 51:1: (Wij roepen als getuigen) degenen die wijd en zijd verspreiden
Danish.verse 51:2: En degenen die de last dragen
Danish.verse 51:4: En degenen die de zaak uitdelen
Danish.verse 51:5: Voorzeker, hetgeen u is beloofd, is waar
Danish.verse 51:6: En voorwaar, het gericht zal zeker plaats hebben
Danish.verse 51:7: Bij de hemelen vol van paden
Danish.verse 51:9: Daarvan wordt afgewend wie zich (van het ware geloof) afwendt
Danish.verse 51:10: Vervloekt zijn zij die vermoedens uiten
Danish.verse 51:12: Zij vragen: Wanneer zal de Tijd des Gerichts zijn
Danish.verse 51:13: Het zal op de Dag zijn, wanneer zij in het Vuur zullen worden beproefd
Danish.verse 51:14: Ondergaat uw beproeving. Dit is hetgeen gij verhaasttet
Danish.verse 51:15: Maar de rechtvaardigen zullen te midden van tuinen en bronnen verkeren
Danish.verse 51:16: Nemend hetgeen hun Heer zal geven omdat zij voorheen goed plachten te doen
Danish.verse 51:17: Gedurende de nacht sliepen zij weinig
Danish.verse 51:18: Tijdens de morgenstond zochten zij vergiffenis
Danish.verse 51:19: En van hun rijkdommen was een deel voor de bedelaars en ook voor degenen die niet konden bedelen
Danish.verse 51:20: En er zijn tekenen op aarde voor hen die zekerheid van geloof willen hebben
Danish.verse 51:21: En ook in uzelf, wilt gij dat niet inzien
Danish.verse 51:22: En in de hemel is uw onderhoud en hetgeen u is beloofd
Danish.verse 51:23: Bij de Heer van de hemel en de aarde - dit is inderdaad de waarheid zoals gij spreekt
Danish.verse 51:24: Heeft het verhaal van Abrahams geeerde gasten u bereikt
Danish.verse 51:25: Toen zij bij hem binnentraden en zeiden: Vrede, antwoordde hij: Vrede. Hij zeide (bij zichzelven): Vreemde mensen
Danish.verse 51:26: Maar hij ging rustig naar zijn gezin en bracht een (toebereid) vet kalf
Danish.verse 51:27: En plaatste het voor hen. Hij zeide: Wilt gij niet eten
Danish.verse 51:28: Daarop begon hij hen te vrezen. Zij zeiden: Vrees niet en zij gaven hem blijde tijding over een wijze zoon
Danish.verse 51:29: Toen kwam zijn vrouw, in verbijstering en sloeg de hand voor het gezicht en zeide: Een verwelkte, bejaarde vrouw
Danish.verse 51:30: Uw Heer heeft het zo gezegd, zeiden zij. Voorzeker, Hij is de Alwijze, de Alwetende
Danish.verse 51:31: Abraham zeide: Wat is uw taak, o boodsehappers
Danish.verse 51:32: Zij antwoordden: Wij zijn naar een schuldig volk gezonden
Danish.verse 51:33: Om brokken klei op hen neder te zenden
Danish.verse 51:34: Door uw Heer gemerkt (ter verdelging) voor de buitensporigen
Danish.verse 51:35: De gelovigen die daarin waren lieten Wij (veilig) weggaan
Danish.verse 51:36: Maar Wij vonden er slechts één huis der Moslims
Danish.verse 51:37: En Wij lieten daarin een teken achter voor hen, die de pijnlijke straf vrezen
Danish.verse 51:38: En in Mozes (is eveneens een teken), toen Wij hem tot Pharao zonden met openlijk gezag
Danish.verse 51:39: Maar deze wendde zich af om zijn macht en zeide: Een tovenaar of een waanzinnige
Danish.verse 51:40: Daarom grepen Wij hem en zijn scharen en wierpen hen in de zee, waardoor hij zelfverwijt kreeg
Danish.verse 51:41: En er was een teken in de Aad, toen Wij een orkaan tegen hen zonden
Danish.verse 51:42: Deze liet van hetgeen hij teisterde niets over of hij maakte het als as
Danish.verse 51:43: En er was een teken in de Samoed toen er tot hen werd gezegd: Vermaakt u voor een wijle
Danish.verse 51:44: Maar zij overtraden het gebod van hun Heer. Daarom achterhaalde hen de bliksem terwijl zij er naar keken
Danish.verse 51:45: En zij konden niet opstaan noch konden zij zich hiertegen beschermen
Danish.verse 51:46: En in het volk van Noach (is ook een teken), voorwaar zij waren een ongehoorzaam volk
Danish.verse 51:47: Voorzeker Wij bouwden de hemel door Onze macht en waarlijk Wij zin het, Die hem hebben uitgebreid
Danish.verse 51:48: En Wij hebben de aarde uitgespreid en hoe uitmuntend hebben Wij dit gedaan
Danish.verse 51:49: En Wij hebben alles in paren geschapen opdat gij er lering uit moogt trekken
Danish.verse 51:50: Haast u daarom tot Allah. Waarlijk ik ben voor u een duidelijke waarschuwer van Hem
Danish.verse 51:51: En werpt geen andere God op naast Allah, waarlijk ik ben voor u een duidelijke waarschuwer van Hem
Danish.verse 51:52: En er kwam tot degenen, die vóór hen waren, geen boodschapper of zij zeiden: Dit is een tovenaar of een bezetene
Danish.verse 51:53: Hebben zij elkander er toe aangespoord? Neen, zij zijn een opstandig volk
Danish.verse 51:54: Wend u daarom van hen af en u zal niets worden verweten
Danish.verse 51:55: Maar ga door met het vermanen want de vermaning helpt degenen die willen geloven
Danish.verse 51:56: En ik heb de djinn en de mensen slechts tot Mijn aanbidding geschapen
Danish.verse 51:57: Ik wens van hen geen onderhoud noch wens Ik dat zij Mij zullen voeden
Danish.verse 51:58: Voorzeker, Allah is de grootste Voorziener, de Almachtige, de Alsterke
Danish.verse 51:59: Voorzeker het lot der onrechtvaardigen is gelijk aan dat van hun gezellen. Laat hen derhalve niet wensen dit te verhaasten
Danish.verse 51:60: Wee over de ongelovigen vanwege de Dag waarmede zij worden bedreigd

Dutch.verse 51:1: Bij de winden die doen opwaaien.
Dutch.verse 51:2: Bij de wolken die een zware last dragen.
Dutch.verse 51:3: Bij de schepen die gemakkelijk voortdrijven.
Dutch.verse 51:4: Bij de verdelers (de Engelen) die volgens een verordening verdelen.
Dutch.verse 51:5: Voorwaar, wat jullie is aangezegd zal zeker bewaarheid worden.
Dutch.verse 51:6: En voorwaar, de (Dag der) Opstanding zal zeker plaatsvinden.
Dutch.verse 51:7: Bij de hemel met zijn banen (van sterren en planeten).
Dutch.verse 51:8: Voorwaar, jullie standpunt (tegenover de Profeet en de Koran) wisselt.
Dutch.verse 51:9: Degene die ervan afgewend wordt, die wordt belogen.
Dutch.verse 51:12: Zij vragen: "Wanneer is de Dag van de Opstanding?"
Dutch.verse 51:13: Op die Dag zullen zij in de Hel verbrand worden.
Dutch.verse 51:14: (De bewaker van de Hel zegt:) "Proeft jullie bestraffing. Dit is waar jullie de bespoediging van vroegen."
Dutch.verse 51:15: Voorwaar, de Moettaqôen verblijven in Tuinen en bij bronnen (in het Paradijs).
Dutch.verse 51:16: Zij nemen wat hun Heer hun geeft. Voorwaar, zij behoorden voorheen tot de weldoeners.
Dutch.verse 51:17: Zij plachten gedurende de nacht weinig te slapen.
Dutch.verse 51:18: En in de laatste uren van de nacht smeekten zij om vergeving.
Dutch.verse 51:19: En van hun bezittingen was een rechtmatig deel voor de bedelaar en voor degene die zich weerhield van bedelen.
Dutch.verse 51:20: En op de aarde zijn Tekens voor de overtuigden.
Dutch.verse 51:21: En ook in jullie zelf, zien jullie dan niet?
Dutch.verse 51:22: En in de hemel is jullie voorziening, en wat jullie is beloofd.
Dutch.verse 51:23: Bij de Heer van de hemel en de aarde: voorwaar, het is zeker waar, zo waar als (het feit) dat jullie spreken.
Dutch.verse 51:24: Heeft de geschiedenis van de geëerde gasten van Ibrahîm jou bereikt?
Dutch.verse 51:25: Toen zij bij hem kwamen, zeiden zij: "Vrede!" Hij zei: "Vrede!", (en hij dacht bij zichzelf:) "Onbekend volk."
Dutch.verse 51:26: Hij ging toen vlug naar zijn familie en bracht een geroosterd kalf.
Dutch.verse 51:27: Hij plaatste het daarop vóór hen, en zei: "Eten jullie het niet?"
Dutch.verse 51:28: (Maar zij wilden niet eten.) Toen voelde hij angst voor hen. Zij zeiden: "Wees niet bang." En zij verkondigden hem de verheugende tijding over (de geboorte van) een verstandige jongeling (Ishâq).
Dutch.verse 51:29: Zijn vrouw kwam schreeuwend naar voren, en zij sloeg zich in haar gezicht, en zei: "Ik ben een oude, onvruchtbare vrouw!"
Dutch.verse 51:30: Zij zeiden: "Zo heeft jouw Heer gesproken: voorwaar, Hij is de Alwijze, de Alwetende."
Dutch.verse 51:31: Hij (Ibrâhîm) vroeg: "Wat is jullie boodschap, O gezanten?"
Dutch.verse 51:32: Zij zeiden: "Voorwaar, wij zijn gezonden naar een volk van misdadigers.
Dutch.verse 51:33: Opdat wij stenen van klei op hen neerzenden.
Dutch.verse 51:34: Die zijn gekenmerkt bij jouw Heer, voor de overtreders."
Dutch.verse 51:35: Toen deden Wij degenen die daar tot de gelovigen behoorden vertrekken.
Dutch.verse 51:36: Maar Wij troffen daar slechts één huis van degenen die zich (aan Allah) overgegeven hadden aan. (het huis van Lôeth)
Dutch.verse 51:37: En Wij lieten daar een Teken achter voor degenen die de pijnlijke bestraffing vreesden.
Dutch.verse 51:38: En ook in (de geschiedenis van) Môesa toen Wij hem naar Fir'aun zonden met een duidelijk bewijs.
Dutch.verse 51:39: Hij (Fir'aun) wendde zich af met zijn gevolg, en hij zei: "(Hij is) een tovenaar, of een bezetene!"
Dutch.verse 51:40: Daarop grepen Wij hem en zijn legers en wierpen hen in de zee. En hem (Fir'aun) trof de blaam.
Dutch.verse 51:41: En in de 'Âd, toen Wij over hen een verwoestende wind zonden.
Dutch.verse 51:42: Die niets heel liet van wat hij tegenkwam, maar (alles) tot ruïnes maakte.
Dutch.verse 51:43: En in de Tsamôed, toen tot hen gezegd werd: "Geniet maar, tot een bepaalde tijd."
Dutch.verse 51:44: Toen waren zij hoogmoedig tegenover het gebod van hun Heer, waarop de bliksemslag hen greep, terwijl zij toezagen.
Dutch.verse 51:45: Toen konden zij niet meer opstaan en zij konden zichzelf niet helpen.
Dutch.verse 51:46: En het volk van Nôeh van daarvóór: voorwaar, zij waren een zwaar zondig volk.
Dutch.verse 51:47: En Wij hebben de hemel met een grote macht gebouwd. En voorwaar, Wij zijn zeker Machtigen.
Dutch.verse 51:48: En Wij hebben de aarde uitgespreid, en de beste Uitspreiders zijn Wij.
Dutch.verse 51:49: En van alle dingen hebben Wij paren geschapen. Hopelijk zullen jullie je laten vermanen.
Dutch.verse 51:50: (Zeg, O Moehammad) "Vlucht daarom naar Allah: voorwaar, ik ben voor jullie van Hem (voor Zijn bestraffing) een duidelijke waarschuwer.
Dutch.verse 51:51: En neemt naast Allah geen andere god: voorwaar, ik ben voor jullie van Hem (voor Zijn bestraffing) een duidelijke waarschuwer."
Dutch.verse 51:52: Zo kwam er tot degenen vóór hen geen Boodschapper, of zij zeiden: "(Hij is) een tovenaar, of een bezetene."
Dutch.verse 51:53: Dragen zij dit aan elkaar over (van geslacht op geslacht)? Zij zijn zelfs een overtredend volk.
Dutch.verse 51:54: Wend je daarom van hen af, dan wordt jou niets verweten.
Dutch.verse 51:55: En vermaan: want voorwaar, de vermaning baat de gelovigen.
Dutch.verse 51:56: En Ik heb de Djinn's en de mens slechts geschapen om Mij te dienen.
Dutch.verse 51:57: Ik wens geen voorzieningen van hen, en ik wens niet dat zij Mij voeden.
Dutch.verse 51:58: Voorwaar, Allah is de Voorziener, de Bezitter van sterke kracht.
Dutch.verse 51:59: Voorwaar, de zonden van degenen die onrecht plegen zijn gelijk aan de zonden van hun soortgenoten (in vroegere generaties). Laten zij daarom Mij niet vragen (de bestraffing) te bespoedigen.
Dutch.verse 51:60: Wee dan degenen die ongelovig zijn op hun Dag die aangezegd is.

English.verse 51:2: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]
English.verse 51:5: Indeed, what you are promised is true.
English.verse 51:6: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.
English.verse 51:8: Indeed, you are in differing speech.
English.verse 51:9: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.
English.verse 51:11: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.
English.verse 51:12: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"
English.verse 51:13: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire
English.verse 51:14: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."
English.verse 51:15: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,
English.verse 51:16: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.
English.verse 51:17: They used to sleep but little of the night,
English.verse 51:18: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,
English.verse 51:19: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.
English.verse 51:20: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]
English.verse 51:21: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?
English.verse 51:22: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.
English.verse 51:23: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.
English.verse 51:24: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -
English.verse 51:25: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.
English.verse 51:26: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
English.verse 51:27: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"
English.verse 51:28: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.
English.verse 51:29: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"
English.verse 51:30: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."
English.verse 51:31: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
English.verse 51:32: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals
English.verse 51:33: To send down upon them stones of clay,
English.verse 51:34: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."
English.verse 51:35: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.
English.verse 51:36: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.
English.verse 51:37: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
English.verse 51:38: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
English.verse 51:39: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."
English.verse 51:40: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.
English.verse 51:41: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.
English.verse 51:42: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.
English.verse 51:43: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."
English.verse 51:44: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.
English.verse 51:45: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.
English.verse 51:46: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
English.verse 51:47: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.
English.verse 51:48: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
English.verse 51:49: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.
English.verse 51:50: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
English.verse 51:51: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
English.verse 51:52: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."
English.verse 51:53: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.
English.verse 51:54: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.
English.verse 51:55: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.
English.verse 51:56: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.
English.verse 51:57: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.
English.verse 51:58: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.
English.verse 51:59: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.
English.verse 51:60: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

Filipino.verse 51:1: Sa pamamagitan (ng hangin) na nagkakalat ng alikabok
Filipino.verse 51:2: At sa (mga ulap) na nag-aangat (at nagdadala) ng mabigat na timbang ng tubig
Filipino.verse 51:3: At sa (mga barko) na umuusad ng madali at banayad
Filipino.verse 51:4: At ang (mga anghel) na namamahagi (ng mga ikabubuhay, ulan at ibang mga biyaya) sa pag- uutos (ni Allah)
Filipino.verse 51:5: Katotohanan, ang ipinangako sa inyo (alalaong baga, ang Muling Pagkabuhay at ang pagtanggap ng gantimpala o kaparusahan sa mabuti o masamang gawa) ay katiyakang tunay
Filipino.verse 51:6: At walang pagsala, ang Kabayaran (kahatulan sa katarungan) ay katotohanang magaganap
Filipino.verse 51:7: Sa pamamagitan ng alapaap (langit) na may maraming Landas
Filipino.verse 51:8: Katotohanang kayo ay may magkakaibang pananaw (tungkol kay Muhammad at sa Qur’an)
Filipino.verse 51:9: Siya kaya na tumalikod dito (alalaong baga, kay Muhammad at sa Qur’an) ay siya kaya na natalikod (sa pamamagitan ng Pag-uutos at Takdang Kahihinatnan ni Allah)
Filipino.verse 51:10: Sumpain ang mga mapaggawa ng kabulaanan
Filipino.verse 51:11: Sila na nasa ilalim ng lambong ng kawalang pakikinig at pagsunod (na nagwawalang bahala sa kahalagahan ng Kabilang Buhay)
Filipino.verse 51:12: Sila ay nagtatanong; “Kailan nga ba ang Araw ng Kabayaran (Paghuhukom sa Katarungan)?”
Filipino.verse 51:13: (Ito ang) Araw na sila ay isusugba (at susubukan ) sa Apoy
Filipino.verse 51:14: “Lasapin ninyo ang inyong pagsubok (pagkasunog)! Ito ang inyong itinatanong na madaliin!”
Filipino.verse 51:15: Katotohanan, ang Muttaqun (mga matutuwid, matimtimang tao na umiiwas sa lahat ng mga ipinagbabawal at sumusunod sa lahat ng mga ipinag-uutos ni Allah), sila ay magigitna sa Halamanan at Batisan (sa Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 51:16: Na nagtatamasa ng kasiyahan sa mga bagay na iginawad ng kanilang Panginoon. Katotohanang noong una pa rito, sila ay naging Muhsinun (mga mapaggawa ng mga kabutihan at katuwiran)
Filipino.verse 51:17: Sila ay nahirati nang matulog ng maigsi lamang sa oras nang gabi (na naninikluhod sa kanilang Panginoon [Allah] at nananalangin ng may pangangamba at pag-asa
Filipino.verse 51:18: At sa mga oras ng bukang liwayway, sila ay (natagpuan) na nagsisipanalangin ng kapatawaran (kay Allah)
Filipino.verse 51:19: At sa kanilang kayamanan ay mayroon dapat na ibahagi sa mga pulubi at sa Mahrum (mga naghihikahos na hindi nanglilimos sa iba)
Filipino.verse 51:20: At sa Kalupaan ay naririto ang mga Tanda sa mga may Pananalig na may katiyakan
Filipino.verse 51:21: At gayundin sa inyong mga sarili. Hindi baga ninyo nakikita
Filipino.verse 51:22: At sa kalangitan ay naroroon ang inyong biyaya, na sa inyo ay ipinangako
Filipino.verse 51:23: Kaya’t sa pamamagitan ng Panginoon ng kalangitan at kalupaan, ito ang tunay na Katotohanan (alalaong baga, ang ipinangako sa inyo), at gayundin ang katunayan na kayo ay makakapangusap sa isa’t isa ng may katalinuhan
Filipino.verse 51:24: Nakarating na ba sa iyo ang kasaysayan ng marangal na Panauhin ni Abraham (ang tatlong anghel; si Gabriel at dalawang iba pa)
Filipino.verse 51:25: Pagmasdan, nang sila (mga anghel ) ay magsitambad sa kanyang harapan at nagsabi: “Kapayapaan!” Siya (Abraham) ay pumakli: “Kapayapaan!, at nagsabi: “Kayo ay mga tao na hindi ko kakilala.”
Filipino.verse 51:26: At siya ay maligsing bumaling sa kanyang kasambahay, at siya ay naglabas ng isang litsong baka (ang karamihan ng ari-arian ni Abraham ay mga baka)
Filipino.verse 51:27: At inilatag (inihain) niya ito sa kanilang harapan at nagsabi: “ Hindi ba kayo kakain? “
Filipino.verse 51:28: (At nang sila ay hindi kumain ), siya ay nakadama ng pagkatakot sa kanila. Sila ay nagbadya: “ Huwag kang matakot.”, (nang mapuna ng mga anghel ang pangamba sa mukha ni Abraham, sila ay nagpakilala na sila ay mga Tagapagbalita ni Allah), at sila ay nagbigay sa kanya ng masayang balita (nang pagdatal) ng isang anak na lalaki (Isaac) na may karunungan (tungkol kay Allah at sa Kanyang Kaisahan, sa Kanyang Relihiyon at Islam)
Filipino.verse 51:29: Datapuwa’t ang kanyang asawa ay lumapit sa kanila na nag-iingay; na tumatampal sa kanyang mukha, at nagsabi: “(Ako) ay isang baog at matandang babae!” (alalaong baga, paano siya [Sarah] magkakaanak gayong siya ay humigit-kumulang na sa 99 taon
Filipino.verse 51:30: Sila (mga anghel) ay nagturing: “Kahit na, ang wika ng iyong Panginoon. Katotohanang Siya ay Tigib ng Karunungan, ang Puspos ng Kaalaman.”
Filipino.verse 51:31: (Si Abraham) ay nagsabi: “Kung gayon, o kayong mga Sugo, ano ang inyong layunin sa inyong pagparito
Filipino.verse 51:32: Sila ay nagturing: “Kami ay isinugo sa mga tao na Mujrimun (mga nakalubog sa kasalanan, buktot, tampalasan, walang pananalig kay Allah, kriminal, atbp)
Filipino.verse 51:33: Upang ihatid sa kanila, (ang ulan) ng mga batong putik
Filipino.verse 51:34: Na itinakda ng iyong Panginoon sa Musrifun (mga mapagsamba sa diyus-diyosan, nagmamalabis sa pagsuway sa lahat ng hangganan, makasalanan, atbp.).”
Filipino.verse 51:35: Kaya’t Aming inilikas ang mga nananampalataya na naroroon
Filipino.verse 51:36: Ngunit wala Kaming natagpuan doon na anumang sambahayang Muslim maliban sa isa (alalaong baga, si Lut at ang kanyang dalawang anak na babae)
Filipino.verse 51:37: At nag-iwan Kami roon ng isang Tanda (alalaong baga, ang pook ng Patay na Dagat [Dead Sea] na bantog sa Palestina), sa mga may pangangamba sa Kasakit-sakit na Kaparusahan
Filipino.verse 51:38: At kay Moises din (ay may isang Tanda). Pagmasdan, nang isinugo Namin siya kay Paraon na may lantad na kapamahalaan
Filipino.verse 51:39: Datapuwa’t (si Paraon) ay tumalikod (sa pananampalataya ng may karahasan) na kasama ang kanyang mga kabig, at nagsabi: “Isang manggagaway, isang inaalihan (ng demonyo)!”
Filipino.verse 51:40: Kaya’t Aming sinukol siya at ang kanyang mga kabig, at sila ay inihagis Namin sa dagat, habang nasa kanya ang bunton ng paninisi
Filipino.verse 51:41: At kay A’ad (ay mayroon ding isang Tanda): Pagmasdan, nang Aming ipinadala laban sa kanila ang mapaminsalang Hangin
Filipino.verse 51:42: Ito (ang Hangin) ay hindi nag-iwan ng anuman sa landas na kanyang tinahak maliban sa pagkasira at pagkabulok
Filipino.verse 51:43: At kay Thamud (ay mayroon ding isang Tanda): Pagmasdan, sila ay pinagsabihan: “Pansamantala kayong magpakasaya sa inyong sarili!”
Filipino.verse 51:44: Datapuwa’t sila ay tandisang tumutol sa pag-uutos ng kanilang Panginoon, kaya’t ang Sa’iqa (ang mapaminsalang hiyaw, kaparusahan, nag-aapoy na kidlat, atbp.) ay lumukob sa kanila habang sila ay nagmamasid
Filipino.verse 51:45: At hindi nila nakuhang makatindig sa kanilang sarili, gayundin ay hindi nila matulungan ang kanilang sarili
Filipino.verse 51:46: (At gayundin naman) ang mga tao ni Noe na una pa sa kanila. Katotohanang sila ay mga tao na Fasiqun (mapaghimagsik, palasuway kay Allah, buktot, buhong)
Filipino.verse 51:47: Aming itinayo ang Kalangitan (sa kaitaasan) ng may kapangyarihan. Katotohanang magagawa Namin na palawigin ang kalawakang yaon
Filipino.verse 51:48: At Aming inilatag ang (maaliwalas) na kalupaan. Pagmasdan kung paano Namin inilatag ito ng may kagalingan
Filipino.verse 51:49: At sa bawat bagay ay lumikha Kami ng pares, upang inyong magunita (ang Biyaya ni Allah)
Filipino.verse 51:50: Kaya’t pasaklolo kayo (sa Habag) ni Allah. Katotohanang ako (Muhammad) ay isang Tagapagbabala sa inyo mula sa Kanya
Filipino.verse 51:51: At huwag ninyong ituring ang iba pang bagay (sa inyong pagsamba) na katambal ni Allah (Siya lamang ang luwalhatiin, higit Siyang Mataas sa lahat nang iniaakibat sa Kanya). Katotohanang ako (Muhammad) ay isang Tagapagbabala sa inyo mula sa Kanya
Filipino.verse 51:52: Gayundin naman, walang sinumang Tagapagbalita ang dumatal sa kanilang pamayanan na hindi nila pinagwikaan maliban sa magkakatulad na bintang: “Isang manggagaway o isang inaalihan (ng demonyo)!”
Filipino.verse 51:53: Sila baga (na mga tao ng panahong sinauna) ay nagpamana ng palipat-lipat na salita sa kanila (na mga paganong Quraish)? Tunay nga, sila ang mga tao na lumabag sa pagsuway sa lahat ng hangganan (ng kawalang pananalig)
Filipino.verse 51:54: Kaya’t lumayo ka (O Muhammad) sa kanila (na paganong Quraish), ikaw ay hindi bibigyang sisi (sapagkat naipaabot mo ang Mensahe ni Allah)
Filipino.verse 51:55: Datapuwa’t paalalahanan mo sila (o Muhammad) sa pamamagitan ng pangangaral (ng Qur’an), sapagkat katotohanan, ang pagpapaala-ala ay kapakinabangan sa mga sumasampalataya
Filipino.verse 51:56: At hindi Ko nilikha ang mga Jinn at mga Tao maliban na tanging sambahin lamang Ako
Filipino.verse 51:57: HindiAkonaghahangadngpagtataguyodmulasakanila (alalaong baga, ng ikabubuhay sa kanilang sarili o sa Aking mga nilalang), gayundin naman Ako ay hindi naghihingi sa kanila na Ako ay kanilang pakainin (alalaong baga, ang pakainin ang kanilang sarili o ang Aking mga nilalang)
Filipino.verse 51:58: Sapagkat katotohanang si Allah ang Tagapanustos ng Lahat, (Siya ang nagbibigay ng lahat ng ikinabubuhay), ang Panginoonng Kapamahalaan, ang Pinakamakapangyarihan
Filipino.verse 51:59: At katotohanang sa mga mapaggawa ng kamalian, ay mayroong isang bahagi ng kaparusahan na katulad ng masamang bahagi ng kaparusahan (na dumatal) sa kanilang mga kasamahan (ng sinaunang lahi), kaya’t huwag nilang hilingin sa Akin na madaliin Ko ( ang gayong bahagi)
Filipino.verse 51:60: Kung gayon, kasawian sa mga hindi sumasampalataya (kay Allah at sa Kanyang Kaisahan; sa Islam) sa takdang Araw na laan para sa kanila, na sa kanila ay ipinangako

French.verse 51:4: Par les distributeurs selon un commandement!
French.verse 51:5: Ce qui vous est promis est certainement vrai.
French.verse 51:7: Par le ciel aux voies parfaitement tracées!
French.verse 51:8: vous divergez sur ce que vous dites.
French.verse 51:9: Est détourné de lui quiconque a été détourné de la foi.
French.verse 51:12: Ils demandent: «A quand le jour de la Rétribution?»
French.verse 51:13: Le jour où ils seront éprouvés au Feu:
French.verse 51:14: «Goûtez à votre épreuve [punition]; voici ce que vous cherchiez à hâter».
French.verse 51:15: Les pieux seront dans des Jardins et [parmi] des sources,
French.verse 51:16: recevant ce que leur Seigneur leur aura donné. Car ils ont été auparavant des bienfaisants:
French.verse 51:18: et aux dernières heures de la nuit ils imploraient le pardon [d'Allah];
French.verse 51:19: et dans leurs biens, il y avait un droit au mendiant et au déshérité.
French.verse 51:20: Il y a sur terre des preuves pour ceux qui croient avec certitude;
French.verse 51:21: ainsi qu'en vous-mêmes. N'observez-vous donc pas?
French.verse 51:22: Et il y a dans le ciel votre subsistance et ce qui vous a été promis.
French.verse 51:23: Par le Seigneur du ciel et de la terre! Ceci est tout aussi vrai que le fait que vous parliez.
French.verse 51:24: T'est-il parvenu le récit des visiteurs honorables d'Abraham?
French.verse 51:25: Quand ils entrèrent chez lui et dirent: «Paix!», il [leur] dit: «Paix, visiteurs inconnus».
French.verse 51:26: Puis il alla discrètement à sa famille et apporta un veau gras.
French.verse 51:27: Ensuite il l'approcha d'eux... «Ne mangez-vous pas?» dit-il.
French.verse 51:28: Il ressentit alors de la peur vis-à-vis d'eux. Ils dirent: «N'aie pas peur». Et ils lui annoncèrent [la naissance] d'un garçon plein de savoir.
French.verse 51:29: Alors sa femme s'avança en criant, se frappa le visage et dit: «Une vieille femme stérile...»
French.verse 51:30: Ils dirent: «Ainsi a dit ton Seigneur. C'est Lui vraiment le Sage, l'Omniscient».
French.verse 51:31: Alors [Abraham] dit: «Quelle est donc votre mission, ô envoyés?»
French.verse 51:32: Ils dirent: «Nous avons été envoyés vers des gens criminels,
French.verse 51:33: pour lancer sur eux des pierres de glaise,
French.verse 51:34: marquées auprès de ton Seigneur à l'intention des outranciers».
French.verse 51:35: Nous en fîmes sortir alors ce qu'il y avait comme croyants,
French.verse 51:36: mais Nous n'y trouvâmes qu'une seule maison de gens soumis.
French.verse 51:37: Et Nous y laissâmes un signe pour ceux qui redoutent le douloureux châtiment;
French.verse 51:38: [Il y a même un signe] en Moïse quand Nous l'envoyâmes, avec une preuve évidente, vers Pharaon.
French.verse 51:39: Mais [celui-ci] se détourna confiant en sa puissance, et dit: «C'est un magicien ou un possédé!»
French.verse 51:40: Nous le saisîmes ainsi que ses troupes, puis les jetâmes dans les flots, pour son comportement blâmable.
French.verse 51:41: De même pour les 'Aad, quand Nous envoyâmes contre eux le vent dévastateur
French.verse 51:42: n'épargnant rien sur son passage sans le réduire en poussière.
French.verse 51:43: De même pour les Thamûd, quand il leur fut dit: «Jouissez jusqu'à un certain temps!»
French.verse 51:44: Ils défièrent le commandement de leur Seigneur. La foudre les saisit alors qu'ils regardaient.
French.verse 51:45: Ils ne purent ni se mettre debout ni être secourus.
French.verse 51:46: De même, pour le peuple de Noé auparavant. Ils étaient des gens pervers.
French.verse 51:47: Le ciel, Nous l'avons construit par Notre puissance: et Nous l'étendons [constamment] dans l'immensité.
French.verse 51:48: Et la terre, Nous l'avons étendue. Et de quelle excellente façon Nous l'avons nivelée!
French.verse 51:49: Et de toute chose Nous avons créé [deux éléments] de couple. Peut-être vous rappellerez-vous?
French.verse 51:50: «Fuyez donc vers Allah. Moi, je suis pour vous de Sa part, un avertisseur explicite.
French.verse 51:51: Ne placez pas avec Allah une autre divinité. Je suis pour vous de Sa part, un avertisseur explicite».
French.verse 51:52: Ainsi, aucun Messager n'est venu à leurs prédécesseurs sans qu'ils n'aient dit: «C'est un magicien ou un possédé!»
French.verse 51:53: Est-ce qu'ils se sont transmis cette injonction? Ils sont plutôt des gens transgresseurs.
French.verse 51:54: Détourne-toi d'eux, tu ne seras pas blâmé [à leur sujet].
French.verse 51:55: Et rappelle; car le rappel profite aux croyants.
French.verse 51:56: Je n'ai créé les djinns et les hommes que pour qu'ils M'adorent.
French.verse 51:57: Je ne cherche pas d'eux une subsistance; et Je ne veux pas qu'ils me nourrissent.
French.verse 51:58: En vérité, c'est Allah qui est le Grand Pourvoyeur, Le Détenteur de la force, l'Inébranlable.
French.verse 51:59: Ceux qui ont été injustes auront une part [de tourments] pareille à celle de leurs compagnons. Qu'ils ne soient pas trop pressés.
French.verse 51:60: Malheur donc à ceux qui ont mécru à cause du jour dont ils sont menacés!

Fulah.verse 51:2: Mi woondirii duule ronndotooɗe toɓo tiiɗngo
Fulah.verse 51:5: ko podete ɗon ko, ko goongo
Fulah.verse 51:7: Mi woondirii kammu jom ɗate ngun
Fulah.verse 51:9: Hino yiltee e makko kala firlitaaɗo e gomɗinal
Fulah.verse 51:12: Hiɓe lamndoo : "Ko honnde woni Ñalaande njoɓdi kuuɗe
Fulah.verse 51:13: Ñalaande nde ɓe leptoyteeɓe ka Yiite
Fulah.verse 51:14: Meeɗee lepte mon ɗen; ko ɗum woni ko keppatnoɗon kon
Fulah.verse 51:15: Pellet, gomɗuɓe ɓen wonii e aljannaaji e ɓulli
Fulah.verse 51:16: Jaggatnooɓe ko Joom maɓɓe okkiɓe ɓe te ko adii ɗuum koɓe moƴƴinatnooɓe
Fulah.verse 51:18: E saanga ndoogu hoɓe toro yaafeede
Fulah.verse 51:19: Ina e jawɗe mumen hakke wonande ñaagatooɓe e ɓe ñaagataako
Fulah.verse 51:20: Ina e nder leydi he maandeeji wonande yananaaɓe
Fulah.verse 51:21: E nder pittaali mon mate on teskataaka
Fulah.verse 51:22: Ina e kammu arsuka mon e ko podante ɗon
Fulah.verse 51:23: E Joom kammu e leydi koɗum goongo hono no kaalirton nih
Fulah.verse 51:24: Mbela arii e maa yeewtere hoɗɓe Ibraahiima teddinaaɓe
Fulah.verse 51:25: Tuma ɓe naatunoo ka makko ɓe wi`i: "Salaam (Kisiyee mon)". O maaki: "Menen ko men ɗenƴii ɓe on
Fulah.verse 51:26: O naayii faade e koreeji makko O addori ngaari payndi
Fulah.verse 51:27: O ɓadaniɓe ndi o wii on ñaamata
Fulah.verse 51:28: O so*i e mum en kulol, ɓe wii woto hul, ɓe weltiniriɓe cuklel
Fulah.verse 51:29: Jom suudu makko ari hombo wulla o hellii yeesa makko, o wii nayeejo dimara
Fulah.verse 51:30: Malaykaaji ɗi mbii ko hono nih Joom ma daali ko Kanko woni ñeeño Ganndo
Fulah.verse 51:31: [Annabai Ibraahiima] maaki: "Ko woni fii mon, onon ɓee nelaaɓe
Fulah.verse 51:32: Ɓe wi`i: "Menen men nela e yimɓe bomɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 51:33: fii yo men accitu e maɓɓe, kaaƴe iwɗe e loope (juɗaaɗe)
Fulah.verse 51:34: maandiniraaɗe ka Joomi maa, fii fantinooɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 51:35: Men yaltini toon kala gomɗimɓe wonunooɓe ton
Fulah.verse 51:36: Men tawaano ton, si wanaa suudu juulɓe wooturu
Fulah.verse 51:37: Men acci ton maande, wonannde ɓen hulooɓe lepte muusuɗe ɗen
Fulah.verse 51:38: [Men acci kadi maande] e Muusaa, tuma nde Men nulunoo mo e Fir`awna, wonndude e hujja ɓannguɗo
Fulah.verse 51:39: Kono o ɗuurnodii e cemmbe makko, o wi`i [Muusaa]: "Ko mbileejo maa feetuɗo
Fulah.verse 51:40: Men nanngi mo kanko e koneeli makko ɗin, Men bugodii ɓe ka maayo, tawde ko o felniiɗo
Fulah.verse 51:41: E ’Adi’en, tuma Men wurtunoo henndu bonndu ndun e maɓɓe
Fulah.verse 51:42: ndu accataa hay huunde nde ndu arani, si wanaa ndu waɗtay nde wa ndoondi
Fulah.verse 51:43: E Samuuda’en kadi, tuma nde ɓe wi`ananoo : "Dakmitee haa seeɗa
Fulah.verse 51:44: Ɓe townitanii yamiroore Joomi maɓɓe nden, haacaango ngon nanngi ɓe, tawi hiɓe ƴeewa
Fulah.verse 51:45: Ɓe waawaano daragol (laawoo), ɓe wonaano kadi faabaaɓe
Fulah.verse 51:46: Ko non kadi yimɓe Nuuhu ɓen ko adii[ɓe]. Ɓen ko yimɓe faasiqiiɓe wonunoo
Fulah.verse 51:47: Kammu ngun, Men mahir ngu doole Amen. Pellet, ko Men yaññuɓe
Fulah.verse 51:48: Leydi ndin kan, Men weertundi. Men moƴƴii weertuɓe
Fulah.verse 51:49: E kala huunde, Men tagii noone ɗiɗi; belajo’o on waajitoray
Fulah.verse 51:50: Awa dogee kisan faade e Allah. Min, wonannde on immorde ka Makko, ko mi jertinoowo ɓannguɗo
Fulah.verse 51:51: Wata on waɗidane Allah reweteeɗo goo. Min, wonannde on immorde ka Makko, ko mi jertinoowo ɓannguɗo
Fulah.verse 51:52: Ko wano non. Nulaaɗo araali e ɓen adinooɓe ɓe, si wanaa ɓe wi`ay : "Ko mbileejo maa feetuɗo
Fulah.verse 51:53: Hara ɓe wasondir e ɗum? Ko woni kon, ɓee ko yimɓe bewuɓe
Fulah.verse 51:55: Waajo tun; sabu waajagol ngol, hino nafa gomɗimɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 51:56: Mi tagiraali jinna e yimɓe, si wanaa fii yo ɓe rewan
Fulah.verse 51:57: Mi ɗaɓɓiraa ɓe arsike; Mi ɗaɓɓaa yo ɓe ñammina
Fulah.verse 51:58: Pellet, ko Allah woni arsikoowo On, Jom cemmbe tiiɗuɗe
Fulah.verse 51:59: Haray hino woodani ɓen tooñuɓe, bakkaat yeru bakkaat nanndo maɓɓe’en, wata ɓe hawju
Fulah.verse 51:60: Bone woodanii ɓen yedduɓe, e nden Ñalaande maɓɓe nde ɓe kammbanaa

German.verse 51:5: sicherlich, was euch angedroht wird, ist wahr,
German.verse 51:6: und das Gericht wird gewiß hereinbrechen.
German.verse 51:9: Abwendig machen läßt sich davon, wer sich abwendig machen läßt.
German.verse 51:12: Sie fragen: "Wann wird denn der Tag des Gerichts sein?"
German.verse 51:13: - Am Tag, da sie im Feuer geprüft werden.
German.verse 51:14: "Kostet (nun) eure Prüfung. Das ist, was ihr zu beschleunigen wünschtet."
German.verse 51:15: Gewiß, die Gottesfürchtigen werden in Gärten und an Quellen sein,
German.verse 51:16: sie nehmen, was ihr Herr ihnen gegeben hat, denn sie pflegten davor Gutes zu tun.
German.verse 51:17: Nur ein wenig pflegten sie in der Nacht zu schlafen,
German.verse 51:18: und im letzten Teil der Nacht pflegten sie um Vergebung zu bitten,
German.verse 51:19: und (sie gestanden) an ihrem Besitz dem Bettler und dem Unbemittelten ein Anrecht (zu).
German.verse 51:20: Und auf der Erde gibt es Zeichen für die Überzeugten
German.verse 51:21: und (auch) in euch selbst. Seht ihr denn nicht?
German.verse 51:22: Und im Himmel ist eure Versorgung und das, was euch versprochen wird.
German.verse 51:23: Beim Herrn des Himmels und der Erde, das ist gewiß so wahr, gleichermaßen wie ihr reden könnt.
German.verse 51:24: Ist zu dir die Geschichte von den geehrten Gästen Ibrahims gekommen?
German.verse 51:25: Als sie bei ihm eintraten und sagten: "Frieden!" Er sagte: "Friede! - Fremde Leute."
German.verse 51:26: Er schlich sich zu seinen Angehörigen und brachte (zum Essen) dann ein ansehnliches Kalb her.
German.verse 51:27: Er setzte es ihnen vor; er sagte: "Wollt ihr nicht essen?"
German.verse 51:28: Er empfand in sich Furcht vor ihnen. Sie sagten: "Fürchte dich nicht." Und sie verkündeten ihm einen kenntnisreichen Jungen.
German.verse 51:29: Da kam seine Frau in großem Geschrei herbei. Sie schlug sich ins Gesicht und sagte: "(Ich bin doch) eine alte, unfruchtbare Frau!"
German.verse 51:30: Sie sagten: "So hat (es) dein Herr gesagt. Gewiß, Er ist der Allweise und Allwissende."
German.verse 51:31: Er sagte: "Was ist nun euer Auftrag, ihr Boten?"
German.verse 51:32: Sie sagten: "Wir sind zu einem Volk von Übeltätern gesandt,
German.verse 51:33: um über sie Steine aus Lehm niederkommen zu lassen,
German.verse 51:34: gekennzeichnet bei deinem Herrn für die Maßlosen."
German.verse 51:35: Und so ließen Wir wer in ihr gläubig war, fortziehen.
German.verse 51:36: Da fanden wir in ihr aber nur ein (einziges) Haus von (Allah) Ergebenen.
German.verse 51:37: Und Wir hinterließen in ihr ein Zeichen für diejenigen, die die schmerzhafte Strafe fürchten.
German.verse 51:38: Und in Musa, als Wir ihn zu Fir'aun mit einer deutlichen Ermächtigung sandten.
German.verse 51:39: Da aber kehrte er sich ab samt seiner Stütze und sagte: "Ein Zauberer oder ein Besessener."
German.verse 51:40: Da ergriffen Wir ihn und seine Heerscharen und warfen sie dann in das große Gewässer, denn er hatte sich Tadel zugezogen.
German.verse 51:41: Und (auch) in den 'Ad, als Wir gegen sie den unheilvollen Wind sandten.
German.verse 51:42: Nichts von (all) dem, worüber er kam, ließ er zurück, ohne es wie Zerfallenes werden zu lassen.
German.verse 51:43: Und (auch) in den Tamud, als zu ihnen gesagt wurde: "Genießt für eine gewisse Zeit."
German.verse 51:44: Sie lehnten sich gegen den Befehl ihres Herrn auf. Da ergriff sie der Donnerschlag, während sie hinschauten,
German.verse 51:45: so konnten sie nicht (mehr) aufstehen und es wurde ihnen keine Hilfe zuteil.
German.verse 51:46: Und (Wir vernichteten) zuvor (auch) das Volk Nuhs; gewiß, sie waren ein Volk von Frevlern.
German.verse 51:47: Und den Himmel haben Wir mit Kraft aufgebaut, und Wir weiten (ihn) wahrlich (noch) aus.
German.verse 51:48: Und die Erde haben Wir ausgebreitet. Wie trefflich haben Wir (sie) geebnet!
German.verse 51:49: Und von allem haben Wir ein Paar erschaffen, auf daß ihr bedenken möget.
German.verse 51:50: So flüchtet (nun) zu Allah. Gewiß, ich bin euch von Ihm ein deutlicher Warner.
German.verse 51:51: Und setzt neben Allah keinen anderen Gott. Gewiß, ich bin euch von Ihm ein deutlicher Warner.
German.verse 51:52: So kam auch zu denjenigen, die vor ihnen waren, kein Gesandter, ohne daß sie gesagt hätten: "Ein Zauberer oder ein Besessener."
German.verse 51:53: Haben sie es denn einander eindringlich empfohlen? Nein! Vielmehr sind sie ein das Maß (an Frevel) überschreitendes Volk.
German.verse 51:54: So kehre dich von ihnen ab; du bist (hierin) nicht zu tadeln.
German.verse 51:55: Und ermahne, denn die Ermahnung nützt den Gläubigen.
German.verse 51:56: Und Ich habe die Ginn und die Menschen nur (dazu) erschaffen, damit sie Mir dienen.
German.verse 51:57: Ich will weder von ihnen irgendeine Versorgung, noch will Ich, daß sie Mir zu essen geben.
German.verse 51:58: Gewiß, Allah ist der Versorger, der Besitzer von Kraft und der Feste .
German.verse 51:59: Gewiß, für diejenigen, die Unrecht tun, wird es einen vorgesehenen Anteil geben wie den Anteil ihrer Gefährten; so sollen sie Mich nicht um Beschleunigung (der Strafe) bitten.
German.verse 51:60: So wehe denjenigen, die ungläubig sind, vor ihrem Tag, der ihnen angedroht ist!

Hausa.verse 51:1: Inã rantsuwa da iskõki mãsu shẽkar abũbuwa, shẽƙẽwa.
Hausa.verse 51:2: Sa'an nan da girãgizai mãsu ɗaukar nauyi (na ruwa).
Hausa.verse 51:3: Sa'an nan da jirãge mãsu gudãna (a kan ruwa) da sauƙi.
Hausa.verse 51:4: Sa'an nan da Malã'iku mãsu rabon al'amari (bisa umurnin Allah).
Hausa.verse 51:5: Lalle abin da ake yi muku alkawari (da zuwansa), haƙĩƙa gaskiya ne.
Hausa.verse 51:6: Kuma lalle sakamako (ga ayyukanku), haƙĩƙa, mai aukuwa ne
Hausa.verse 51:7: Inã rantsuwa da samã ma'abũciyar hanyõyi (na tafiyar taurãri da sautin rediyo).
Hausa.verse 51:8: Lalle kũ, haƙĩƙa, kunã cikin magana mai sãɓa wa juna (game da Alƙur'ani).
Hausa.verse 51:9: Anã karkatar da wanda aka jũyar (daga gaskiya).
Hausa.verse 51:11: Waɗanda suke shagala a cikin zurfin jãhilci.
Hausa.verse 51:12: Sunã tambaya: "Yaushe ne rãnar sakamako zã ta auku?"
Hausa.verse 51:13: Ranar da suke a kan wuta anã fitinar su.
Hausa.verse 51:14: (A ce musu): "Ku ɗanɗani fitinarku, wannan shĩ ne abin da kuka kasance kunã nẽman zuwansa da gaggãwa."
Hausa.verse 51:15: Lalle mãsu taƙawa, sunã a cikin lambunan itãce da marẽmari.
Hausa.verse 51:16: Sunã mãsu dĩbar abin da Ubangijinsu Ya bã su. Lalle sũ, sun kasance mãsu kyautatãwa a gabãnin haka (a dũniya).
Hausa.verse 51:17: Sun kasance a lõkaci kaɗan na dare suke yin barci.
Hausa.verse 51:18: Kuma a lõkutan asuba sunã ta yin istigfãri.
Hausa.verse 51:19: Kuma a cikin dũkiyarsu akwai hakki ga (matalauci) mai rõƙo da wanda aka hana wa rõƙo.
Hausa.verse 51:20: Kuma a cikin ƙasã akwai ãyõyi ga mãsu yaƙĩni.
Hausa.verse 51:21: Kuma a cikin rãyukanku (akwai ãyõyi). To, bã zã ku dũbã ba?
Hausa.verse 51:22: Kuma a cikin sama arzikinku (yake fitõwa) da abin da ake yi muku alkawari.
Hausa.verse 51:23: To, kuma Ina rantsuwa da Ubangijin sama da ƙasã, lalle shĩ (abin da ake yi muku alkawari), haƙĩƙa gaskiya ne, kamar abin da kuka zamo kunã karantãwa na magana,
Hausa.verse 51:24: Shin, lãbãrin Bãƙin Ibrãhĩm, waɗanda aka girmama, ya zo maka?
Hausa.verse 51:25: A lõkacin da suka shiga gare shi, sai suka yi sallama; ya ce "Aminci ya tabbata a gare ku, mutãne bãƙi!"
Hausa.verse 51:26: Sai ya jũya zuwa ga iyãlinsa, sa'an nan ya zo da maraƙi tutturna,
Hausa.verse 51:27: Sai ya kusantar da shi zuwa gare su, ya ce: "Bã zã ku ci ba?"
Hausa.verse 51:28: Sai ya ji tsõro daga gare su. Suka ce: "Kada kaji tsõro." Kuma suka yi masa bushãra da (haihuwar) wani yaro mai ilmi.
Hausa.verse 51:29: Sai matarsa ta fuskanta cikin ƙyallõwa, har ta mari fuskarta kuma ta ce: "Tsõhuwa bakarãriya (zã ta haihu)!"
Hausa.verse 51:30: Suka ce: "Kamar haka Ubangijinki Ya faɗa. Lalle Shĩ, Shĩ ne Mai hikima, Mai ilmi."
Hausa.verse 51:31: (Ibrãĩm) ya ce: "To mẽne ne babban al'almarinku, yã kũ Manzanni!"
Hausa.verse 51:32: Suka ce: "Lalle mũ, an aike mu zuwa ga waɗansu mutãne, mãsu laifi.
Hausa.verse 51:33: "Dõmin mu saka musu waɗansu duwãtsu na wani yumɓu (bom).
Hausa.verse 51:34: "Waɗanda aka yi wa alãma daga wajen Ubangijinka, dõmin mãsu ɓarna."
Hausa.verse 51:35: Sa'an, nan Muka fitar da wanda ya kasance a cikinta daga mũminai.
Hausa.verse 51:36: Sai dai ba mu sãmu ba, a cikinta, fãce gida guda na Musulmi.
